rules_text:
Prowess
When this creature or another nontoken creature you control with prowess enters, put a zeal counter on target Faerie.
Remove a zeal counter from this creature: Add one mana of any color.
notes:
Type A — UR

QQ

The Progeny followed the cats into the bloom in search of sunshine, and still protect them within Catrest’s fog-soaked towers.
